page.title: 20CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: Many clubs and societies hold meetings in{Kemble}and {Poole Keynes.} They are attended by the people from the local area and a few of the surrounding villages. These clubs include: Sunday School, Bible Study and Prayer Group, Toddlers' Church, Mothers' Union, British Legion, Women's Institute, Good Companions, Youth Club, Playgroup, Cubs and Scouts, Keep Fit, Dancing, Whist Drives, Day Centre for Senior Citizens. The Village Hall Committee arrange other events such as dances, discos, concerts and sales.
